html:
1.18.18  10:28 am   is there a good method for sending you a personal message? do you take carrier pigeons?

     how about electronic mail (e-mail)

1.18.18  10:22 am   How do you feel about lucid dreaming?

     i think i'm in one

1.18.18  10:21 am   Can you show me what happiness is?

     all i can do is show you as many things as i can, i can't predict which ones will make you happy

1.18.18  10:14 am   What is a scarmble

     scramble

1.18.18  10:04 am   Have you thought about ever branching in other interests and or hobbies?

     i have done that quite a bit and will do it more

1.18.18  10:01 am   why haven't you changed the 240 on your wall to 420

     because i already changed it from 420 to 240

1.18.18  9:56 am   i would like it if you grew out your hair again, like how you had it in early 2014! i think it looked very nice, but i understand if you don't want to do that too

     that's about where it is now

1.18.18  9:55 am   how do i leave earth permanently?

     rockets?

1.18.18  9:53 am   Is there a way to make people around me happier without slowly draining my soul?

     people will always be on a wave ride between happy and sad. you don't need to be responsible for necessarily making them happy, but definitely just make sure you are not making them sad

1.18.18  9:30 am   1.17.18  1:55 am You do it all the time. Talking music theory is talking code.

     hold on a second. i feel like i'm going insane here. it seems like every day people ask me to talk about 'music theory' which i think is a misleading term anyway, but i feel like everyone is constantly asking me to talk about it and i feel like i am constantly reminding people that it is all meaningless unless you are considering the way the music ACTUALLY SOUNDS. i feel like i say this over and over again. the question you are originally referring to was someone who was complaining about 'errors on my site' but actually they were talking about what they perceived to be errors in the code, which actually didn't effect the user experience. so i pointed out that i don't think these should be viewed as errors if they don't actually effect the user experience. i want to be clear that i feel EXACTLY the same way about music, and sometimes i feel like a slalom skier trying to dodge all these 'music theory' questions that try to make music out to be something that lives on the page, and sure it's great to be literate but the whole point of it is the way it sounds. so it really drives me crazy that you are blaming me for talking about music code etc when every single time i feel like i have to remind people to return to the way it SOUNDS. so again, let me re-iterate that my views here about music are congruent with the views i said about code, in the other question. i just had to clarify because you are really making me feel insane here and i need to explain this clearly

1.18.18  9:24 am   How do I tell someone I love them

     i think you should get to know them first. once you know them well enough it should be fine to tell them, or even better, maybe they will tell you first

1.18.18  9:22 am   i have a huge amount of music ideas and melodies and harmonies in my head but i can't put them out because i don't have the material. is there a free way to make music that you know of ?

     there are many. if you look around you will surely find some

1.18.18  9:16 am   Why the world is so simple and conplicated at the same time?

     so that it is both easy and fun

1.18.18  9:07 am   Do you know yet what your next project/song is going to be?

     yes

1.18.18  9:05 am   What would you want to say to your haters bill ?
 

     i suppose that would vary from hater to hater

1.18.18  9:03 am   What flavor Pickle is the best?

     that's really none of my business

1.18.18  9:02 am   Is there a way out?

     yes, and in

1.18.18  8:13 am   Do you like clocks ? And time ?

     yes

1.18.18  8:13 am   will you take my money?

     sure

1.18.18  8:07 am   How are you so good at composing?I'm just starting to learn music theory and it's confusing.

     don't forget to spend a lot of time listening, and playing, and trying things out

1.18.18  7:12 am   Do your videos have a hidden message ?

     i don't usually like to hide my messages. i prefer to say them loud and clear

1.18.18  6:45 am   where did you get inspiration to write new canaan?

     in penn station. i know that doesn't make sense because they informed me at penn station that they don't have a train that goes to new canaan, and the train to new canaan is from grand central. so i went to grand central. but the idea to take trains to places i had never been and write songs along the way was an idea that i had in penn station, several weeks before i wrote any of them

1.18.18  5:30 am   what do you call those 180 turns in some of your song endings? (for example La de da de da de da de day oh, Hey Jodie Foster and I Don't Wanna Go To School, somewhat)

     i have been calling that an exit limerick

1.18.18  3:48 am   Do you craft keyboard solos or just improvise on the spot when making the song?

     sometimes a little of both. for example, in 'la de da', i was very sure when i wrote the song that i would be quoting the "where did all the good times go" melody in that spot

1.18.18  3:43 am   I really like "Got To Know What's Going On", what was the inspiration for that one?

     just wanting to know what's going on

     Why no youtube release? 

     because there was no video for it

1.18.18  3:43 am   Did you record any footage of you playing the chords to your new song? On keys

     yes. and included it in the final video

1.18.18  2:14 am   What is the best way to browse questions, random or normal mode?

     which one do you prefer

1.18.18  1:03 am   hey bill, I really enjoy your musical ideas. would love to help mix/master your music free of charge
also are you in NYC? your apartment seems the right level of cramped for that to be the case

     can you actually email me and talk about this? my email is billwurtz at billwurtz dot com. thank you so much

1.18.18  12:57 am   is being scared an irrational thought?

     no

1.18.18  12:47 am   I noticed you wearing a shirt with your profile picture on it. Any input or news for merch?

     yes, i made a deal with the devil and i am now doing it

1.18.18  12:43 am   i can't seem to distinguish whether or not i would label some people as "friends" or just people i talk to time to time.

     luckily you don't have to make that distinction until tax time

      i'm just drifting around with no actual "friends", and i do get lonely once and a while, wishing i had someone to talk to. however, i can never seem to find an appropriate time to just join a conversation like, "hi am a fellow person can i talk wit you blahbahaugh" since everyone is already so acquainted with one another and i'm a random ass stranger. i just want to know if you've ever felt anything similar to this

     oh hell yeah

      and/or have any advice?

     it sounds like you are on the right track

     (sorry if this is all over the place.)

1.18.18  12:20 am   can I give you $10000?

     sure

1.18.18  12:02 am   What is the most beautiful thing in the world?

     the world

1.17.18  11:55 pm   why are your answers so cryptic

     i don't think they are cryptic, but i respect your opinion. actually i have answered probably 25,000 questions so i'm sure some of them are cryptic. but i think the vast majority of them are not cryptic

1.17.18  11:46 pm   What device were you using to explain the things you feel and express the things you mean? 

     at the time i wrote that line, i was actually using a piece of staff paper

1.17.18  11:45 pm   Do u ever feel yourself starting to cry when u listen to music just because of the sounds themselves not for any particular emotional reason? Because it happens to me a lot

     yes

1.17.18  11:37 pm   i just got an electric guitar but don't know what to learn on it help me out bill

     what songs do you know, or like?

1.17.18  11:28 pm   Are you an atheist or an agnostics?

     not exactly

1.17.18  11:24 pm   Has anyone ever reached out to you about showing your work in a museum or gallery?

     yes

      Are you interested in showing your work in these contexts?

     it depends on the situation

1.17.18  11:00 pm   was la da de da de da de day oh the huge project everyone was talking about

     it was the project i have been working on since my last project. i don't know who was talking about it because i was busy doing the project

1.17.18  10:51 pm   theres a thing i really want to do but outside forces are preventing me from doing it how can i cope with this?

     star in a t.v. show where you try to accomplish things, despite outside forces

1.17.18  10:46 pm   How much time do you put into answering these questions?

     hopefully 1 second. unless the question for some reason stirs a deep emotional conflict within my soul

1.17.18  10:44 pm   what is something people don't seem to understand about you?

     i think a lot of people think that i just go online and 'post' projects and they appear immediately, without having to make them first

1.17.18  10:43 pm   Do you have a set schedule where you allot time to work on your projects or is your productivity dictated by your mood.

     i work on projects as much as humanly possible

1.17.18  10:43 pm   did u run away from home?

     i think i am running toward it

1.17.18  10:38 pm   Do you aspire to resolve anything in 2018?

     i always aspire to resolve as many things as i can, regardless of what year it is

1.17.18  10:34 pm   1.16.18  8:52 pm how did you spell it the first time

     the first word was "le"

1.17.18  10:25 pm   What do you do when you don't know what your doing with your life?

     do what you would say you would do if you were in another world and someone asked you what you would do if you were in this world

1.17.18  10:23 pm   Is typing the questions and answers manually into the html code really the best way to go?

     i don't think so. luckily i'm not doing that. actually i do type the answers manually, i think that is still the most accurate way to transfer words and writing from my mind to the computer

1.17.18  10:16 pm   it isnt on spotify bill

     what isn't
